description: JurisPro provides a free directory of expert witnesses in over 10,000 areas of expertise.

cases.title: Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness Testimony Excluded in Motor Vehicle Litigation
cases.description: Plaintiff's Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness was excluded in case against U.S. Postal Service because he based his opinion on unreliable websites.

cases.title: Business Valuation Expert Witness Testimony Allowed in ERISA Case
cases.description: A Business Valuation Expert Witness was allowed to testify using multitudes of revenue and EBITDA to value a company.

cases.title: Workers Compensation Insurance Expert Witness Testimony Allowed
cases.description: A Workers Compensation Insurance Expert Witness was allowed to testify despite lacking any Missouri experience, education, or knowledge with respect to audits.

cases.title: Medical Device Architect Expert Witness Testimony Allowed in Case Involving an MRI
cases.description: An Architecture Expert Witness was allowed to testify regarding alleged faulty MRI equipment despite the claim his opinion was based only a recitation of the documents he reviewed.
